Class ec.cosm.costume.Choreography 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class ec.cosm.costume.Choreography 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.cosm.costume.Choreography
public class Choreography
extends Object
implements RtCodeable
Choreography is a bundle of gestures and their building blocks. Structures and Costumes can both contain Choreography, and we may have standalone Choreography some day as well.
See Also:
Structure, Costume

Choreography()

addAnimation(Animation)
Adds an animation to this choreography
addGesture(Gesture)
Adds a gesture to this choreography
addPosition(Position)
Adds a position to this choreography
animationCount()
Returns the number of animations defined by this choreography
classNameToEncode(RtEncoder)
decode(RtDecoder)
encode(RtEncoder)
gestureCount()
Returns the number of gestures defined by this choreography
getAnimationNamed(String)
Returns the Animation of the given name stored in this choreography, or null if none.
getAnimations()
Returns an enumeration of the named animations defined by this choreography.
getGestureNamed(String)
Returns the Gesture of the given name stored in this choreography, or null if none.
getGestures()
Returns an enumeration of the named gestures defined by this choreography.
getPositionNamed(String)
Returns the Position of the given name stored in this choreography, or null if none.
getPositions()
Returns an enumeration of the named positions defined by this choreography.
positionCount()
Returns the number of positions defined by this choreography
removeAnimation(Animation)
Removes an animation from this choreography's list of animations.
removeGesture(Gesture)
Removes a gesture from this choreography's list of gestures.
removePosition(Position)
Removes a position from this choreography's list of positions.

getAnimationNamed 
  public Animation getAnimationNamed(String name)
Returns the Animation of the given name stored in this choreography, or null if none.
getAnimations 
  public Enumeration getAnimations()
Returns an enumeration of the named animations defined by this choreography. Returns null if this choreography defines no animations.
getGestureNamed 
  public Gesture getGestureNamed(String name)
Returns the Gesture of the given name stored in this choreography, or null if none.
getGestures 
  public Enumeration getGestures()
Returns an enumeration of the named gestures defined by this choreography. Returns null if this choreography defines no gestures.
getPositionNamed 
  public Position getPositionNamed(String name)
Returns the Position of the given name stored in this choreography, or null if none.
getPositions 
  public Enumeration getPositions()
Returns an enumeration of the named positions defined by this choreography. Returns null if this choreography defines no positions.
positionCount 
  public int positionCount()
Returns the number of positions defined by this choreography
removeAnimation 
  public void removeAnimation(Animation animation)
Removes an animation from this choreography's list of animations.
removeGesture 
  public void removeGesture(Gesture gesture)
Removes a gesture from this choreography's list of gestures.
removePosition 
  public void removePosition(Position position)
Removes a position from this choreography's list of positions.
